channel.title: 317 lime whip hits PI
channel.description: i added the lime whip stats and color and everything else but i think i left a part out that i did wrong, whenever i hit someone or NPC it does this like weird hit as if i was using my fist or hand it doesnt do the correct abby whip hit. If anyone knows a fix please contact me on skype:soda432 or post below. thanks.
